content.prompt:
In sentence 2 (reproduced below), the writer wants to develop the introduction to the passage’s topic by providing relevant information about the focus and scope of the Chicano movement.

The movement concentrated primarily on the rights of agricultural workers but also on larger matters affecting the Mexican American community at the time.

Which of the following versions of the underlined text best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: and was led by labor organizers César Chávez and Dolores Huerta
but took much of its inspiration from the African American Civil Rights movement
and collaborated closely with a Filipino labor organization with the same goals

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
